titles.title: Make the District of Columbia Safe and Beautiful Act
Make the District of Columbia Safe and Beautiful Act
A bill to establish a program to beautify the District of Columbia and to establish the District of Columbia Safe and Beautiful Commission, and for other purposes.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 155.
